entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
